AUTHENTICATION.CREDENTIALS_SUSPENDED: Your account has been suspended, Please contact our support
AUTHENTICATION.MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS: Multiple accounts are found against given credentials, Please contact our support

MISSING_ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Missing required attribute (name)
MISSING_ATTRIBUTES.TITLE: Missing required attribute (title)
MISSING_ATTRIBUTES.PRE_POST_DETAIL: Pre Description or Post Description, atleast one them is required
